snippet: PILCH--Todd David 7/61 - 1/15/99 Happy 55th Birthday in Heaven. I will never stop thinking about you and wondering if you are okay - that's what big sisters are for. You became a great-uncle with the birth of James William. And we all missed you a...
lead_paragraph: PILCH--Todd David 7/61 - 1/15/99 Happy 55th Birthday in Heaven. I will never stop thinking about you and wondering if you are okay - that's what big sisters are for. You became a great-uncle with the birth of James William. And we all missed you at your nephew's medical school graduation. With all my love, Sue 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  PILCH, TODD DAVID 7
